column1: TripReason in Volkswagen-CSO system exceeds maximum attribute length of EMS
column26:
In the engine log I found an error coming from Volkswagen-CSO system. Apparently the tripReason is send to the engine as part of the calculate and it is a long German translated text which exceeds the maximum attribute length of 250 in the EMS.
 
Possible solutions might be to not send the tripReason since I doubt it changes the calculation as it is a translated description? Or to shorten it so the expense.tripReason = abc is under 250 characters.
 
Correlation ID: 8D817BE5AE4046908AFB458445F40A0C

column1: Update the filebased austrian statutory system and follow up with an update of all EMS instances
column26:
h4.  

*Is blocked by the engine release 20.3.1*

Hello Codebusters,

As a result of the issue EXPENG-953 the filebased austrian statutory system needs to be updated in the kv handel configuration (Country: AT/ StatID: kv_handel).

1) customlogic.properties.xml files:
    1.1) Remove the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.KV_HANDEL.absences.subCalculator.absence.KvHandelTripLimitCalculator from the AbsenceList hook.
    1.2) Add the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.basic.absences.subCalculator.meal.SetLimitMealCalculator in the AbsenceListBasedMeal hook at the first position (0)
    1.3) Switch the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.basic.absences.subCalculator.meal.listBased.ActualMealCalculator in the AbsenceListBasedMeal hook for the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.KV_HANDEL.absences.subCalculator.absence.KvHandelMealCalculator

2) country_per_diem_factors.txt and country_per_diem_fix_values.txt files:
    2.1) Add the entry "fairRate" to line 4 (label) in the file country_per_diem_factors.txt. 
    Add an additional identical entry to the other lines.
    
    2.2) Add the value 20.36 to as an additional entry to the country line of austria (AT) in the file country_per_diem_fix_values.txt. 
    For all other country lines add an additional entry with the value of 0.0
 
When the changes have been merged, download the newly build archive for ifaode-ems as soon as it is available ([https://exp-jenkins.home.ifao.net:8443/job/EMSCC/job/Convert%20Bali/ws/output/]) and Import this archive on staging and all production servers.
The option to overwrite existing blocks will have to be enabled during import.

 

*As an additional Point* please enable the following remote tests in the class net.ifao.expense.tools.test.remoteTests.DTValidationTests by removing the annotation @Disabled.


 * dt29654_12DaysMealDeduction
 * dt29654_13DaysMealDeduction

column1: ARD / add new calculation for private time and business time on the same calender day
column26:
Please confugure the following new calculation/custom logic:

When a user ticks the checkbox "private extension/interruption" on the same calender day on which he also had business time, then the per diems should not be suppressed for the whole absence day but the per diems should be calculated per country marked in yellow in the attached screenshot of the BMF letter for an absence for more than 8 hours per calender day, for example for Germany 14 EUR instead of 28 EUR. 

We have the same logic for customer Porsche AG, so you can copy/paste it.

 !image-2022-12-02-09-12-45-113.png|thumbnail!

column1: porsche:ITE-1383 - update configuration for receipts
column26:
as per ITE-1383 we need to adapt configuration so in the mobile app they have the same receipts as in the desktop

*current:* only 31 receipts available in mobile app (34 available in cytric desktop)

*target:* same receipts available in cytric should be available in mobile

 

+required in configuration as per ITE:+

 

the configuration is setup to use configuration of type Code and a Location default.
In the Code Configuration 'Business Trip' we have numbered 34 receipt types. In the Code Configuration 'Collective Statement' we have no receipts defined.
In the Location Configuration, we have numbered 31 receipt types plus on receipt for 'Company Car Load'.
Different to Desktop where on Statement Creation, you select the correct configuration (Business Trip / Collective Statement) you do not have this option when capturing receipts. Hence, in this case Mobile will use the Location receipts in your given scenario

+*Follow up:*+
Either change the configuration to avoid working with Code configuration or ask Mobile PM for a timeline if and when to change the behavior in Mobile
column174:
system: https://travel.cytric.net/ibe?system=Porsche
server: travel
location: Porsche Deutschland GmbH

column1: deutschlandradio:estimation EF for implementing 3 month rule
column26:
please provide EF required for implementing the 3 month automatic rule:

Set suppress statutory when three month of absence to the same place is reached: 
This needs to be always done, meaning the traveler is not legible to per-diems any more

 

note: client has these specifications:

1. as soon as the traveller is within the three-month period, the per diem for meals shall be capped, i.e. no more additional meal expenses shall be paid to the traveller.
2) Within the three-month period, meals arranged or paid for by Deutschlandradio are to be recognized as remuneration in kind and no longer subject to the statutory meal allowance reductions (20/40/40).

(the non-monetary remuneration values are not to be reduced from the reimbursement amount of the traveler,  but the full reimbursement amount is to be paid to the traveler and the non-monetary remuneration values are to be transfer  with the wage type "3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort. in the export to be taxed in our HR system )

3. the non-monetary remuneration values should not be reduced from the reimbursement amount of the traveller, but the full reimbursement amount should be paid to the traveller and the non-monetary remuneration values should be  transferred with the wage type "3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort. in the export, in order to then pay tax on them in our HR
 system.

 

thank you

system: 	deutschlandradio
server: mega
locations: Deutschlandradio, Test Standort

column1: ProcuRX-Jifiti - adjustment the "expense.currency"
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please adjust the "expense.currency"

Customer get the error for "{*}Invalid target currency of exchange rate"{*}
I found the past same EMS issue case. ITE-882



The "house currency" is always determined by

1) the currency in the TMS of the location of the user (see screenshot below) 
2) the currency in the EMS/Engine configuration from the statutory properties settings (Could not check cause of missing Access/EMS Superadmin role)

If 1) and 2) mismatch usually the observed error is shown.

!_SA_TMS Currency_location.png|width=649,height=580!

I think that the this value is different currency or not set.

!image-2022-11-30-15-59-52-178.png|width=416,height=254!
!image-2022-11-30-16-00-28-034.png|width=433,height=75!

We set this US location in USD and Jifiti NL in EUR because I was told that the leading currency for each location is based on the currency in the respected country,
please change the currency in the EMS to USD for the US location and EUR in the NL location so that the users will be able to work on this system.

Best regards,
Yutaka

MEGA / ProcuRX-Jifiti

column1: dmD | Change approval workflow to FDF-approver based on cost center
column26:
Customer dm-drogeriemarkt wants to make usage of [https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=EXPDLY&title=Allow+approver+selection+based+on+FDF+value+for+Expense+approval] 

The have provided the attached file which describes the relationship between the cost center value and it's corresponding approvers. 

 

Please do the following:

1) Review the attached .{*}csv-file{*}

column1: dmD: Add validator to prevent submit statements with itinerary for config key "Reiseauslagen ohne konkrete Reise"
column26:
Client dm-drogeriemarkt is using two config keys:

1) Dienstreiseabrechnung 

2) *Reiseauslagen ohne konkrete Reise*

 

For 2) ** *Reiseauslagen ohne konkrete Reise* please add a validator which prevents the user to submit statements which contain an itinerary. **

 

+Expected behavior:+

User cannot submit statements which contain an itinerary and therefore would lead to per-diem calculation and reimbursement. 

 

+Error message to be used:+
||Error message||Fehlermeldung||
|Itineraries are not permitted for this configuration. |Reiseverläufe sind in dieser Konfiguration nicht zulässig. Zur Abwicklung von Dienstreisen bitte die Konfiguration "Dienstreisenabrechnung" nutzen. |

column1: ARD / adjustment for calculation for vehicle type "kleine Wegstrecke"
column26:
Please make the following adjustments for the calculation for vehicle type "kleine Wegstrecke" for "Dienstreise" and "Sammelabrechnung": 

Actually the amount is capped by 130,00 EUR for this vehicle type per absence. 

1. Adjustment for travel scheme "Dienstreise":

Please change this logic from "per absence" to "per statement" so that only a maximum of 130,00 EUR will be charged for the whole statement even if you have selected the vehicle type "kleine Wegstrecke" in multiple absences in one statement.

2. Adjustment for travel scheme "Sammelabrechnung":

Here the calculation per absence can remain as it is currently configured.

column1: allianz:invalid type of receipt
column26:
as per ite-1386 we must correct:

The receipt type - in the receipt type block of the EMS config for ABV is named "{_}exp{color:#de350b}ne{color}se.basereceipt.receipt.{color:#de350b}allianz.{color}mvv.fee{_}" 

Due to typo and additional _"allianz."_ in the EMS config the system cannot find the EMS settings for the receipt type. 

I also find it personally bad practice to put no labels/translations into the EMS. It is true that the labels are still loaded from the CE-Core configuration and not from the EMS, but for completeness, readability and for avoiding errors after the migration I would prefer to see also labels/translations in the EMS.

column1: Allianz - Change message in error​.expense​.receipt​.entertainmentLimit.
column26:
Dear Team,

Please chage the message of the error​.expense​.receipt​.entertainmentLimit.

 

DE Current message:

„In einem Ihrer Bewirtungsbelege ist ein Fehler aufgetreten. Die betroffenen Belege sind mit einem roten Balken markiert. Bitte beachten Sie, dass die maximale Erstattung für Bewirtungen (einschließlich Trinkgeld) 250,- € je Abrechnung beträgt."

 

DE NEW:

„Bitte beachten Sie, dass die Summe aller Bewirtungsbelege („Bewirtung Fremde", „Bewirtung MA bis 60 EUR/Person" „Bewirtung MA über 60 EUR/Person"), nicht die maximale Erstattung (einschließlich Trinkgeld) in Höhe von 250,- € übersteigen darf.

Bewirtungskosten über 250,- € müssen über den Auszahlungsworkflow oder ähnliche Prozesse beantragt werden."

 

 

EN current message:

"There is an error in one of your entertainment receipts. The effected receipts are marked with red bars. Please be aware that the maximum amount for entertainment is 250,- € per expense statement. A validation error occurred during the last attempt to calculate this expense statement."

 

EN NEW:

"Please notice that the sum of all entertainment receipts ("business entertainment external", "entertainment employee up to 60 EUR/person", "entertainment employee over 60 EUR/person"), must not exceed the maximum amount of 250,- €.

Entertainment costs over 250,- € needs to be requested for reimbursement via the payment workflow or similar processes."

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: Adapt usage of ElementStringLinkValidator
column26:
In EXPENG-851 we will introduce new error code parameters for the ElementStringLinkValidator.
We decided to implement this change without backwards compatibility since the only affected system is "volkswagen-bentley".
||Environment||system id||block id||hook||
|Travel|3730432632|A1DC9E95821A4856B37D516662DD724B|validation.VehicleUsage|
|Travel|3730432632|EB12E6BE80E24CD9A37F9E861CF4956D|validation.VehicleUsage|

Please check if the system has custom translations for one of the following codes:
 * error.expense.accommodation.noLink
 * error.expense.accommodation.noLinkValue
 * error.expense.accommodation.notStringLink
 * error.expense.accommodation.emptyLinkValue
 * error.expense.accommodation.wrongLinkValue
 * error.expense.vehicleUsage.noLink
 * error.expense.vehicleUsage.noLinkValue
 * error.expense.vehicleUsage.notStringLink
 * error.expense.vehicleUsage.emptyLinkValue
 * error.expense.vehicleUsage.wrongLinkValue

If not then there is nothing to be done since the default translations won't change.

If the system contains custom translations then the corresponding new error code parameter (see below) needs to be set through the json view to the previous error code (list above).
 * errorCodeNoLink
 * errorCodeNoLinkValue
 * errorCodeNotStringLink
 * errorCodeEmptyLinkValue
 * errorCodeWrongLinkValue

column1: Increase the the field width for the name of internal participants in all global subinternalparticipants report templates
column26:
The following error occurs regularly during the report generation in the system Burda.

{{{}Infinite loop creating new page due to column header overflow
{}}}([https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/app/kibana#/doc/3afe1f90-e0e8-11ec-b748-a7b709a9fb27/ee.1-2022.47/doc?id=InI3mIQBtNwRl3q3Osi6)]

This error is caused when the name of a internal participant in the entertainments detailed report exceeds around 79 characters as the current size of the text box becomes to small at this point.

A tested solution to this problem is to increase the width of these text boxes to support names with more Characters.

column1: Fix the cause for the org.graalvm.polyglot.PolyglotException in the ama-de-TUI-UAT system on Production
column26:
Hello Codebusters,

when I checked our engine logs on kibana prod I noticed the occurrence of multiple rg.graalvm.polyglot.PolyglotException in the *ama-de-TUI-UAT* system.

{{TypeError: Cannot read property 'indexOf' of undefined}}

As it looks like, the cause of the exception stems from the var *carDesc* being null while the indexOf-Method is called.

Please fix the error.

 * Location/ Country:       GB - TUI GROUP GREAT BRITAIN/ GB
 * Phase/Hook:                 validation/ VehicleUsage

column1: Infinite loop in report generation

When checking our expense engine kibana logs we found an infinite loop in current file-based report generation for system "Burda".

Error: https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/goto/11271df31fdacb6feafb7aeda17c5023

column1: Continental -  Add new validation rule and DFD for receipts (Hotel bill, Breakfast on the bill and Breakfast out of the bill)
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please add new validation rule and DFD for receipts (Hotel bill, Breakfast on the bill and Breakfast out of the bill).

*{color:#ff0000}Customers test staging system first. We can then deploy to the production system.{color}*

*<Cutoff date>*
Staging > We can overwrite our changes.
Prod > 01.01.2023
(Engine)
20221001-20230101
20230101-99999999
(Vegas)
Please new create date config.
ex: configuration_2023.xml

*<DFD>*
{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="NumberOfDays" type="Text" mandatory="true" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.numberOfDays">
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_Receipt}" displayOrder="2">
            <gui>
              <dataFieldGUI guiType="FREE_TEXT" />
            </gui>
            <validation>
              <regEx expression="[0-9]*" />
            </validation>
          </assign>
        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">Number of days</name>
          <name locale="fr_FR">Number of days</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <descriptionTranslation>
           <name locale="en_US">Number of days</name>
           <name locale="fr_FR">Number of days</name>
         </descriptionTranslation>
        <roles>
          <canEdit name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseArranger" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseAuditor" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseAccountant" />
          <canSee name="ExportProcess" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseManager" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
        </roles>
      </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}
Receipts
"expense.basereceipt.receipt.hotel"
"expense.basereceipt.receipt.continental.breakfast.on_bill"
"expense.basereceipt.receipt.continental.breakfast.out_bill"

<Validation rule>
Receipts > "hotel bill" and "Breakfast out of the bill"
                   *{color:#ff0000}"Breakfast on the bill" >No need validation rule{color}*

*Hotel Bill*
Validation rule> The cap defined for the couple (country, city) for the receipt type HOTEL * number of days entered. If the calculated amount is lower than the entered amount or the converted amount => No error message – When the calculated amount is higher => One error message has to be displayed
             
Sample: maximum limit(CAPS_AT country) of 110 EUR X 6 nights.
Lower 660EUR> No error message
Higher 660EUR > get the error message

CAPS:
[https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/ama-de-continental/fr/default/20221001-99990101/calculation.properties]

!image-2022-11-18-14-26-37-789.png!

*Breakfast out of the bill*
Validation rule: The fixed cap defined for the receipt type BREAKFAST OUT OF THE BILL * number of days entered. If the calculated amount is lower than the entered amount or the converted amount => No error message – When the calculated amount is higher => One error message has to be displayed

Sample: maximum limit of 11 EUR X 6 nights.
Lower 66EUR> No error message
Higher 66EUR > get the error message

CAPS:

column1: Use the new FindPerDiemExtendedSpecialOvernightCase calculator
column26:
In EXPENG-859 we will adapt the FindPerDiemDE calculator to again only consider 2 day trips for the special overnight case.

Tui specifically requested in the past to consider 3+ day trips as well, therefore we implemented the FindPerDiemExtendedSpecialOvernightCase calculator which can be used as a replacement for the FindPerDiemDE calculator.

Adapt TUI systems and any other customer who wants to consider 3+ day trips for the special overnight case.

The new calculator will be released with version 20.3.0

Thanks

column1: Failing scripts for system demo-apac
column26:
During our daily log checks we found multiple instances of failing calculations most likely caused by scripts that manipulate prices for receipts. The correct way to configure this behavior is to attach limits to the receipts instead of changing the price objects directly.

Affected system: demo-apac
Example of failing script: https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/demo-apac/sg/default/20190101-99990101/178794040/customlogic.properties.xml#6

column1: Replace deprecated parameter validationMessage
column26:
The parameter validationMessage of multiple validators has been deprecated some time ago. There are still some systems using this parameter but only for the SimilarReceiptsValidator.

Please adapt the below systems:
||Environment||System id||Block id||
|Amadeus A|2754385058|F953DCCE18A94AA6BA770D008FE0EBA1|
|Amadeus A|2754385058|57400C61721549C18AE422A2D9270BD7|
|Amadeus A|2754385058|E15D414BF5DF4471A91E1DAE8E73EEE4|
|Amadeus B|2754385058|57400C61721549C18AE422A2D9270BD7|
|Amadeus B|2754385058|E15D414BF5DF4471A91E1DAE8E73EEE4|

_I assume that A and B are related to the server split and only one needs to be adapted depending on which environment the system should be kept on._

The validationMessage parameter needs to be replaced by adding a translation for the errorCode parameter.
By default the errorCode parameter is "error.expense.multipleSimilarReceipts", so the validationMessage text can simply be added to the translation block for this error code.
If there are multiple validationMessage parameters used in this system with different texts then custom error codes will have to be used for the different messages since one error code can only contain one translation.

column1: Rheinmetall / adjust existing approval validation calculation
column26:
Dear colleagues,

the issue was investigated with https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1080 (shortened outcome under the examples below)
{color:#ff0000}Please implement{color}
 * {color:#ff0000}first on{color:#FF0000} {color}{color}{color:#FF0000}Bali 
{color}for all locations  
 * {color:#FF0000}THEN ONLY FOR TEST LOCATION{color} 
Rheinmetall AG Teststandort on {color:#FF0000}PROD{color}
 *  
 * {color:#ff0000}after testing and customers approval: 
{color}for all other locations on production

{color:#ff0000}the following{color}:
 * customer wants to compare non reimbursable amount vs. total amount of the statement 
 * {color:#ff0000}if there is a reimbursement{color}:
deviation percentage between non reimbursable amount and total amount of the statement must be calculated as shown in the calculation example below and:
 ** if deviation is less or equal to 10%:
approval must be skipped
 ** if deviation is higher than 10%:
approval must be triggered

{color:#ff0000}calculation examples:{color}

{color:#ff0000}*8839237*{color}
*!image-2022-11-11-16-30-31-749.png|width=651,height=322!!image-2022-11-11-16-31-31-561.png|width=674,height=229!*
*!image-2022-11-11-17-12-36-847.png|width=531,height=229!*
*Reimbursement amount = 94,40 EUR*

*Calculation as expected by customer:*
{*}total statement amount ({*}{*}all receipts, itineraries, per diems...{*}{*}) = 672,07 EUR{*}
compared to
*reimbursable amount = 577,67 EUR*
deviation is about 14%:

*(577,67*100) / 672,07 = 85,95%*
*100% - 85,95% = 14% deviation* 
*=> approval must be triggert because deviation is higher that 10%*
{color:#ff0000}
*8868133*{color}

!image-2022-11-11-17-48-41-272.png|width=719,height=349!

!image-2022-11-11-17-50-24-873.png|width=642,height=270!

!image-2022-11-11-17-52-03-989.png|width=546,height=217!

*Reimbursement amount = 457,86 EUR*

*Calculation as expected by customer:*
{*}total statement amount ({*}{*}all receipts, itineraries, per diems...{*}{*}) = 2.963,94 EUR{*}
compared to
*non reimbursable amount = 2506,08 EUR*
deviation is about 15%:

*(2506,08*100) / 2963,94 = 84,55%*
*100 - 84,55 = 15% deviation* 
*=> approval must be triggert because deviation is higher that 10%*

Outcome of ITE-1080:

+*Error as reported:*+
Customer complains that Expense Statements skipped approval despite the max. deviation of 10% was exceeded.

+*Root Cause:*+
There are two things applying for this ticket
1. There is a misunderstanding on customer side. 
As confirmed internally, the calculation was not done in the way they provide in the documentation:
We never compared the non-reimbursable amounts against the total amounts, but we compared the booking amounts against the total amounts.

2. There is a small inconsistency in the used code: We get all the receipts and check if they have booking information. If this is the case we get the amount. However, we have scenarios that result in multiple receipt types in Expense, but referencing the same booking code. This means, for some cases, we get the same booking amount multiple times which results in cumulated booking amount that is higher than the real booking amount and Statements skip Approval due to this.

+*Solution:*+
If they want to calculate differently to the current means of calculation and use the method they provided in their example above, this will make calculation easier and avoid issues coming from root cause

Reply

column26:

column1: Traton - adjust private accomodation
column26:
Dear colleagues,

please adjust the {color:#ff0000}private accomodation in EMS {color}with the following values:

{color:#ff0000}{{AMOUNT: 20,00 Euro for all trips and countrys}}{color}
{color:#ff0000}{{G/L account: 47600}}{color}
{color:#ff0000}{{cost center comes directly from the trip}}{color}

{color:#ff0000}analogous to solution recommedation{color} of Martin Rohkamm from ITE-1194:{*}{{*}}

+*Issue as reported:*+ In the TRATON system private accommodation is selectable in the travel itinerary, but on calculate a validation error is raised

*Root Cause:*

Caused by invalid configuration.

1) Vegas (UI) is displaying at all traton locations the private accommodation type because of the ce-configs setting:

!image-2022-11-11-14-51-18-878.png|width=1250,height=341!

 

2) The accommodation type is set in the test locations, but *no allowance* is configured (country settings below):

!image-2022-11-11-14-52-48-338.png|width=1100,height=576!

 

3) In all other Prod TRATON locations the accommodation block is present, but completely blank (meaning no allowed accommodations for calculation are present in the engine):

!image-2022-11-11-14-54-13-072.png|width=1169,height=540!

 

The result is a validation error - stating that the accommodation type private is not allowed.

+*Solution:*+

Configure the EMS setting for "private" accommodation as type + the allowances per country or for "ALL" 




Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette
column174:
Server:         travel
System:        TRATON
Location / Division:                    all

column1: ARD / add new checkbox with custom logic
column26:
Please add this following new checkbox on absence level:

name: Eintägige Dienstreise zu einem Standort meiner Rundfunkanstalt mit Kantinenversorgung

custom logic:
If this checkbox is ticked, the per diems for this absence must be suppressed!

column1: Link on expense statement email for WACKER
column26:
Hi,

 

Wacker wants to have in the expense emails the SAML link instead of direct URL.

The URL in the expense email should be [https://staging.cytric.net/svc/SAML2/cWS/pre/AUTH?clientId=SAMLWACKERTEST]

 

{*}System URL{*}: [https://staging.cytric.net/HRGDE-wacker]

 

Please do not hesitate to contact me in case of any questions.

column1: ARD / add new wage type
column26:
Please add this new wage type to the configuration:

Lohnsteuerbescheinigung Zeile 20
wage type: LZ20

Calculation: LZ20 is the sum of all per diems in a statement minus the sum of the received meals in s statement!

column1: Burda - Add new validation rule for "FDF"
column26:
Hello team,

Customer requested add new validation rule for "FDF".

"Cost Center" and "Order Number" should be option (Not mandatory)
But, The user should receive an error if both these fields do not input a value.

"Cost Center" and "Order Number"  value are blank. =>{color:#ff0000} *Get the error*{color}
!image-2022-11-09-19-09-41-427.png|width=510,height=162!

Values are entered for either or both "Cost Center" and "Order Number" => {color:#ff0000}*No error*

*!image-2022-11-09-19-08-42-594.png|width=408,height=108!*
*!image-2022-11-09-19-08-56-983.png|width=411,height=118!*
*!image-2022-11-09-19-09-17-015.png|width=402,height=120!*{color}

 

Error message:
(EN)Please enter a Cost Center or Order Number on header level of the expense statement.
(DE)Bitte geben Sie in den Kopfdaten der Reisekostenabrechnung eine Kostenstelle oder Auftragsnummer ein.

Best regards,
Yutaka

column224:
16/Nov/22 3:54 PM;gheorghe;Hi [~yutaka]  & [~mkuchciak] 

The CL is rejected and there will be a product enhancement coming in PI#6, ticket from product to follow and be linked to this one

[~yutaka] the enhancement will refer to FDF that are dependent like in your example cost center and order number, if one of the two is filled no error, if none then an error. Is it safe to assume that will only refer to a FDF that are in a dependent relationship or can it occur to have a list of FDF that are not linked? If needed, pls check with the customer

If no answer by PI planning, the assumption of dependency will be considered

Thanks;;;

What does "the assumption of dependency will be considered" mean?
The system will not return an error if either or both of these FDFs contain values.
However, if both are blank, it raises an error.;;;

column1: Add the cbt exchange rate provider in the global turkish configuration
column26:
*Is blocked by the engine release 20.3.0*

To Configure the usage of the CBT exchange rate provider complete the following steps

1.) set the exchange rate provider in the global turkish configuration to CBT;ECB;OANDA in the filebased configuration

2.) As soon as the next reference system archive ([link to the archive|https://exp-jenkins.home.ifao.net:8443/job/EMSCC/job/Convert%20Bali/ws/output/]) is available including the global turkish configuration, import it on all Bali servers.

3.) Create a EPM ticket for the import of the reference system archive on staging and production

column1: PDF report missing in calculate response from Engine
column26:
Hello codebusters team,

On Expense NG logs, we started to see an increased number of errors where the calculation response from Engine doesn't include the PDF report content.

You can see the NG logs on Kibana [here|https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ng/app/kibana#/discover?_g=(refreshInterval:(pause:!t,value:0),time:(from:now-7d,mode:quick,to:now))&_a=(columns:!(logId.message,logId.contextData.system),filters:!(('$state':(store:appState),meta:(alias:!n,disabled:!f,index:'4b176900-5112-11ed-9b28-fdd4edbd9080',key:logId.level.keyword,negate:!f,params:(query:ERROR,type:phrase),type:phrase,value:ERROR),query:(match:(logId.level.keyword:(query:ERROR,type:phrase)))),('$state':(store:appState),meta:(alias:!n,disabled:!f,index:'4b176900-5112-11ed-9b28-fdd4edbd9080',key:logId.message,negate:!f,params:(query:'The%20PDF%20report%20file%20is%20missing%20from%20the%20Engine%20response',type:phrase),type:phrase,value:'The%20PDF%20report%20file%20is%20missing%20from%20the%20Engine%20response'),query:(match:(logId.message:(query:'The%20PDF%20report%20file%20is%20missing%20from%20the%20Engine%20response',type:phrase))))),index:'4b176900-5112-11ed-9b28-fdd4edbd9080',interval:auto,query:(language:lucene,query:''),sort:!(logId.time,desc))].

It seems like a similar issue to https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CI-7636 which was fixed last week.

Could you please take a look?

Best regards,
Dzhuneyt
column222: 09/Nov/22 9:59 AM;gmalarski;https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ng/goto/5b23d8e7abdccbbe0eff43f6c4358dd6;;;
column223:
09/Nov/22 3:52 PM;mkuchciak;The ticket is related to https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CI-7626.

[~jtkacz] is dealing with it. Hence this ticket can be closed as along with solving 7626 the issue should gone.;;;
column224:
09/Nov/22 4:07 PM;dshaban;Hello [~mkuchciak]  [~jtkacz] ,
CI-7626 is closed and we are still facing this problem. I am not sure this is the same case.

In CI-7626 it is reported a text overlap but in this case we don't have the PDF report at all, it is missing completely from the Engine response. Hence, the calculate operation is failing and the end user cannot even download/see a report.

I think these are different problems.

Please take your time to investigate this one further.;;;

column1: bentley: wrong perdiem for country denmark
column26:
h2. *issue reported:*

please remove from the perdiem the rate calculated as ##lodge##

of value 140.91 gbp for country denmark

this amount is not in the perdiem configuration and should not apply

examples:
 * 8332658
 * 8255713
 * 8320740 (attached)

           Created 07.11.2022 08:23

column1: Bad script performance
column26:
Multiple scripts in system ama-de-vaillant especially in validation phase have poor performance. And [this script|https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/ama-de-vaillant/de/default/20221101-99990101/customlogic.properties.xml#296] as en example can and should be replaced by the MandatoryMealDeclarationValidator.

Please adapt those scripts to use the new interface or at best replace them by non script solutions like the mentioned validator above.

Cases in kibana: https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/goto/449bb1288f6a9c708ffc4af4b469422c

25/Nov/22 1:11 PM;jtkacz;Hello [~hilbich] ,

as I got to know I cannot replace the script mentioned in description with MandatoryMealDeclarationValidator, because it works only with separated checkbox outside meals section (see picture no.2 below). I think we can't do this without asking customer about his opinion. It's too big change in UI. What is your opinion? Besides that Fabrice decided to take care of only necessary part of the CI and do the rest of it within Vaillant migration which is planned on H1 2023.

column1: Very bad script performance

Please adapt at least the linked script in all config keys to use the new script interface or replace/adapt the script by a solution with better performance.

column1: dmD: Fix CC-feed errors (AirPlus)
column26:
Please review the result of https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1300 and fix the errors in the cc-feed configuration for customer dm-drogeriemarkt 

 

Not sure if this helps but this link is a summary around the cc-feed configuration possibilities:

[https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=EXPDLY&title=Usage+of+Credit+Card+Transaction+Data]

 

+*Extract from ITE-1300:*+

 

+*Solution:*+
All behaviors are caused by the configuraiton. From the configuration it is not possible that all of the scenarios were done on the Test Location as the Test Location does not have the given Credit Card setup

*1.* Checked on the Test Location: This is the correct behavior because Class Car is setup with two receipt types and Taxi is the default receipt. So when a cytric Booking arrives it is created as Taxi
!image-2022-11-07-09-47-53-893.png|width=871,height=214!
*2.* Checked on the Production Location: This is the correct behavior because within this configuration there is no parameter defined for the matching. There is only defined wthin the Credit Card setup from which field we can get the DetailNumber. But this is not enough. You need to define the matchingTripType with DetailNumber when the matching should be by DetailNumber
The TripDetailNumber on the Credit Card is correct in this case.
*3.* Checked on Production Location. Credit Card receipts are marked as paid by Traveler because this is setup this way. It is setup with paidByCompanyDefaultsTo="false", meaning all receipts are paid by Traveler. I would not use this setting together with AirPlus card as on AirPlus we do have the information for paid by company. This is the billingType
!image-2022-11-07-09-48-15-340.png!

column1: Activate report template for new systems
column26:
In CI-7453 the report template has been set to be disabled for all existing customers to avoid sudden changes without information to the customer.

New systems however should be using the report template by default, therefore please add the following property in system default in the file-based configuration in file defaultsystemsettings.properties:

engine.pdf.template=true

Afterwards import the adv. system settings block of the most recent config converter archive in the global system of EMS bali and request an import forr QA, staging and production.

column1: FATAL exception on ama-de-enercon system
column26:
ELK shows an FATAL exception when executing the AccommodationReceiptsValidator in the ama-de-enercon system.

The system didn't create CalendarDay entries which results in NullPointerException within the AccommodationReceiptsValidator. Is it correct that the system doesn't calculate on CalendarDay?

To fix this and recreate the behavior of the previous release the AccommodationReceiptsValidator needs two additional parameter to be set.
 * scope = STATEMENT
 * condition = FORCE_RECEIPT

column1: bentkey:automatic rejection set up
column26:
h2. *issue reported:*

it seems automatic rejection of 3weeks deadline works only first time in a statement.

If the statement is auto rejected  and then submitted again, then in 3 days if it is not approved, it gets rejected automatically 

example: id 7756408

creator: [catherine.wilson@bentley.co.uk|mailto:catherine.wilson@bentley.co.uk]

location: Bentley Motors Ltd., Crewe
 * submitted 22.09.2022 08:58 
 * auto rejected: 13.10.2022 08:58 ({color:#FF0000}correct){color}
 * submitted: 13.10.2022 09:01
 * auto rejected: 19.10.2022 09:01
 * submitted: 19.10.2022 09:04
 * auto rejected: 25.10.2022 09:04

!image-2022-11-03-15-39-24-019.png!

 
h2. *target:*

can you please ensure the automatic rejection is always 3 weeks regardless if the statement has been resubmitted?

 

thank you

column1: Remove unknown parameter from StorePerDiem configuration
column26:

https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/goto/a64f0671e4720cc4d4234db61598557e

This makes the finding of real problems in the engine hard.

*Please fix the ama-bcd-oge-de configuration.*

{{{{The subActor net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.all.companyRules.StorePerDiem does not contain a setter for the following properties: operands,regex,linkRole,operation}}}}

column1: FR Market Template - new vehicle type for electric vehicles
column26:
Hello team,

According to the tax authority, if electric vehicles are used, the mileage rates will be increased by 20% over the existing mileage rates for cars and motorbikes.

The calculation rules for classification by power and mileage accumulation remain the same as before.

Please add the following new vehicle type and apply the mileage rates as per the table below, which are calculated 20% increase from the existing tables.

 
|Vehicle type|Fiscal power|Up to 5,000 km|More than 5,000 km and up to 20,000 km = (A)|More than 20,000 km|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Motorcar up to 3CV*{color}|3 CV and less|d*{*}{color:#4c9aff}0.602{color}{*}|(5,000 km*{color:#172b4d}0.602{color}) + (d’* {color:#4c9aff}*0.36*{color})|(A) +( d”* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.42{color}{*})|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Motorcar 4CV*{color}|4 CV|d*{*}{color:#4c9aff}0.69{color}{*}|(5,000 km*0.690) + (d’*{color:#4c9aff}*0.388*{color})|(A) +( d”* {color:#4c9aff}*0.464*{color})|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Motorcar 5CV*{color}|5 CV|d*{color:#4c9aff}*0.724*{color}|(5,000 km*0.724) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.407{color}{*})|(A) +( d”* {color:#4c9aff}*0.486*{color})|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Motorcar 6CV*{color}|6 CV|d*{color:#4c9aff}*0.757*{color}|(5,000 km*0.757) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.426{color}{*})|(A) +( d”* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.51{color}{*})|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Motorcar 7CV and more*{color}|7 CV and more|d*{color:#4c9aff}*0.793*{color}|(5,000 km*0.793) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.449{color}{*})|(A) +( d”* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.535{color}{*})|

_d = distance in km_

_d’ = distance in excess of 5,000 km_

_d” = distance in excess of 20,000 km_
|Vehicle type|Fiscal power|Up to 3,000 km|More than 3,000 km and up to 6,000 km = (A)|More than 6,000 km|
|*{color:#4c9aff}Electric Motorbike up to 2CV{color}*|1 CV to 2 CV|d*{*}{color:#4c9aff}0.45{color}{*}|(3,000 km*0.45) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.113{color}{*})|(A) + (d”* {color:#4c9aff}*0.281*{color})|
|*{color:#4c9aff}Electric Motorbike 3CV-5CV{color}*|3 CV to 5 CV|d*{color:#4c9aff}*0.533*{color}|(3,000 km*0.533) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.094{color}{*})|(A) + (d”* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.313{color}{*})|
|*{color:#4c9aff}Electric Motorbike more than 5CV{color}*|More than 5 CV|d*{*}{color:#4c9aff}0.69{color}{*}|(3,000 km*0.69) + (d’* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.09{color}{*})|(A) + (d”* {*}{color:#4c9aff}0.39{color}{*})|

_d = distance in km_

_d’ = distance in excess of 3,000 km_

_d” = distance in excess of 6,000 km_
| |Up to 3000 km|More than 3,000 km and up to 6,000 km= (A)|More than 6,000 km|
|{color:#4c9aff}*Electric Moped (up to 50cc)*{color}|d*{color:#4c9aff}*0.359*{color}|(3,000 km*0.359) + (d’*{color:#4c9aff}*0.084*{color})|(A) + (d”*{color:#4c9aff}*0.194*{color})|

_d = distance in km_

_d’ = distance in excess of 3,000 km_

_d” = distance in excess of 6,000 km_

column1: Wacker AG / difference between Debit and Credit postings
column26:
Please check why all receipt types (Hotel, Flight, etc.) are missing in the posting records for receipts marked as "paid by company" and for receipts marked as" to be reimbursed":

You can check it with my statement 272603 on Staging in role "Auditing

In the statement i added a flight markes as "to be reimbursed":

 !image-2022-10-27-16-45-58-456.png|thumbnail! 

But in the posting records this flight is missing in the Debit postings:

 !image-2022-10-27-16-47-47-524.png|thumbnail! 

and only the per diems are displayed in the Debit postings.

Please correct it so that we have no difference between Debit and Credit postings!

column1: dmD: Please add "AccommodationReceiptsValidator"
column26:
Please add "AccommodationReceiptsValidator" introduced with https://jira.ifao.net/browse/EXPENG-958 

 

Validator should be configured as "PREVENT_RECEIPT" (Hotel receipt), then don't allow submitting hotel receipt in case one private accommodation is present.

Validator scope should be CALENDAR_DAY. Hotel receipt and private accommodation cannot be claimed for the same day. 

 

{color:#de350b}*This validator should be available with Release 20.3 - 20. 11.2022*{color}

column26:

Eine Auftragsnummer darf nicht zusammen mit einer abweichenden Kostenstelle in einer Abrechnung erfasst bitte, bitte anpassen!

An order number must not be added together with a different costcenter in one statement, please adjust!

column1: TeamBank - wrong SAP for Staging system
column26:
Dear Team,

Team Bank explained to me that they have two different SAP.

The fisrt one for the Production system and the other one for all test done on the staging system called SAP-QSU.

But today all their tests done in their staging system go to the SAP "production" and not to the SAP-QSU.

Do you aware that there is two different SAP for production system and for test system?

Please could you have a look and let me know what do you need to set up properly the Team Bank statging system with the SAP-QSU.

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: [GFT Wave 6] changed custom logic around "Region" of Madrid
column26:
In the implementation project for Amadeus Australia and New Zealand, The user and customer have noticed a user issue when doing an expense for the subsidized destination of Madrid.

Many times, user forgot to specify the region attach to Spain and to select Madrid.

As we cannot make the region a mandatory field.

A custom logic can be put in place in order to have the subsidized per diem when going to Madrid as per the comment from Jakub

"I've changed custom logic and now if FDF "Region" is empty or Madrid region is chosen and the checkbox Amadeus Premises is ticked calculation is correct and per diem equals 80 AUD. "

Customer confirm to apply this logic for all locations.

if any comment, can also refer to Jakub TKACZ

 

Best regards,

Philippe

Location: all

We should leave it unchecked when the employee starts a report. Otherwise, it might confuse employees, and they leave it clicked because it came like this and then the calculation could be wrong.

Philippe;;;

column26:

Der-co-init complains that the calculation of the calculation of the §4(5) EStG 30% amount is wrong because it doesn't include the TIP.

 

In the example below you can see that only the entertainment is splitted into 70/30.

100 EUR - 15,97 EUR (tax) = 84,03 EUR

84,03 EUR x 30 % = 25,21 EUR

!image-2022-10-25-16-46-26-667.png!

Please could you fix?

This customer has already EMS, I don't know if it's something that could be fix in EMS but if it's the case, please explain the steps to correct and like this BAYANI Team will do it in the future.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: SEAT - Not working export transfer for attachment and report
column26:
Hello team.

I opened the ITE-1258. Dorren mentioned to me that the attachment and report descriptor need to be in a <findUnit>
Could you please adjust the descriptor and folder.

1. Adjust the descriptor
{color:#de350b} *(I mask the sensitive part of the sftp path.*{color}
{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="expense.attachments.ftp.url" type="Text" feature="${CYTRIC_EXPENSE_BUSINESS_CODE}">
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">External ftp url for expense attachments</name>
          <name locale="en_GB">External ftp url for expense attachments</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">External ftp url for expense attachments</name>
          <name locale="pt_PT">External ftp url for expense attachments</name>
          <name locale="es_ES">External ftp url for expense attachments</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_TimedConfiguration}" />
        </assignTo>
      </dataFieldDescriptor>
      <findUnit>
        <fdfs>
      <FDF code="expense.attachments.ftp.url">
        <item value="sftp://xxxxxxxxx@sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/exports" />
          </FDF>
        </fdfs>
      </findUnit> 

     <dataFieldDescriptor code="expense.reports.ftp.url" type="Text" feature="${CYTRIC_EXPENSE_BUSINESS_CODE}">
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">External ftp url for expense reports</name>
          <name locale="en_GB">External ftp url for expense reports</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">External ftp url for expense reports</name>
          <name locale="pt_PT">External ftp url for expense reports</name>
          <name locale="es_ES">External ftp url for expense reports</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_TimedConfiguration}" />
        </assignTo>
      </dataFieldDescriptor>
            <findUnit>
        <fdfs>
      <FDF code="expense.reports.ftp.url">
        <item value="sftp://xxxxxxx@sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/exports" />
          </FDF>
        </fdfs>
      </findUnit>{code}
2. Change destination folder
>Attchment
"sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/{color:#de350b}*attachments*{color}" to "sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/{color:#de350b}*exports*{color}"
>Report
"sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/{color:#de350b}*reports*{color}" to "sftp-dmz.secure.ifao.net/ama-es-seat/{color:#de350b}*exports*{color}"

Best regards,
Yutaka

regular > 0.10

            final MutableCostType notaxratekey = new MutableCostType(TypeOfTaxRate.NO_TAX_RATE_KEY, null, null, null, null, "C0", "C0");

column1: Request System Activation
column26:
User should have Super Admin to all the below Mentioned systems 

#Super admin to Login to EMS and Activate Expense-notification 

 To Activate Feature in EMS you can check the below Page ([https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/display/EMS/Activating+features+in+EMS])

To Activate the Expense, you should make sure to include this 
    {color:#de350b}*cytriceasy.statementNotifications.enabled=true*{color}
! *Important* : Make sure when Activating the Expense Feature to set the Validity date correctly and specially End Date - no need to mention end date at this stage

column1: Hugo boss – Add tax rate new custom logic
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please add tax rate new custom logic.

{color:#FF0000}*Please Deploy to a production test location first. We can be deployed to production locations after customer testing.*{color}

Location: Hugo Boss AG
Receipt type: Only receipt of "Hotel" (Hotel Costs / Accomodation)
Tax rate: 0% and non-tax
Remarks: If user select the following countries, the TAX rate code will be changed from B0 to B7 for posting.

column222: 20/Oct/22 10:16 AM;mbucko;Requested logic can't be implemented by the use of a standard functionality. Forwarding ticket to CL board.;;;
column223:
03/Nov/22 2:20 PM;gheorghe;Hi all, this ticket was missing from the Jira board until today, the board cases need to have both label CLBoard_Pending + custom logic ticked as otherwise will not enter my dashboard

It will be brought to the board next Wednesday;;;
column225:
09/Nov/22 4:14 PM;gheorghe;Dear all,

We have discussed the topic in the board.

Our understanding of the requirement was that the customer has 0% for B0 for Hotel and all countries, but would like for specific countries in the export only to overwrite with B7 tax key while maintaining 0% in the UI.

This most probably depending on the country corresponds to a certain tax rate % different than 0 since they are claiming they can ask for the money back and the customer requested for the shortcut. They are requesting to show something to all actors in the workflow while in the export in the posting to be different.

First of all, this requirement is achievable in Vegas by mapping for each country for Hotel the corresponding tax rate (e.g. 9%, 15%, etc.) and tax key B7, but of course it demands considerable effort as it means to map a different tax rate and tax key per 35 countries.

e.g.

Hotel 7 %- B7 Belgium

Hotel 5% - B7 France

Our approach at the time has been that we do not allow any foreign rates and if we do it will be up to 7rates/ 7 countries therefore from our point of view, this request should have been rejected from the start as we do not support with foreign VAT reclaim within Cytric itself and tell the customer to go to VAT specialists for such claims.

Therefore if they are not willing to wait for the product enhancement I mentioned previously and again below, they need to go through a partner to help them with VAT foreign reclaim, you may want to check what are the options with our current VAT partner.

At this stage, the board does *not* endorse any custom logic as it is a bad practice.

Please be aware that in terms of the product enhancement [EXPENG-1006|https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjira.ifao.net%2Fbrowse%2FEXPENG-1006&data=05%7C01%7C%7C80943bd17407428202eb08dac095aa5d%7Cb3f4f7c272ce4192aba4d6c7719b5766%7C0%7C0%7C638034046289054979%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=qGgqMDlQga2nMUG6Hy4cdBh1chHAFQXXATxzwUPoKvA%3D&reserved=0] that will come in next PI6, first iteration, it implies to be able to overwrite a tax key only, no tax rate, for a certain receipt in specific countries so it will respond to their requirement as we were able to understand it.

Hope this clarifies.

I remain at your disposal shall you have any further questions.;;;

column1: AZ_KBV Copy VEGAS config from ABV
column26:
*Source*

DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG AD

 

*Destination*

DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG KBV

 

*ERS*

AZ_KBV Copy VEGAS config from ABV

[ERS_Allianz KBV_DE.xlsx|https://amadeusworkplace.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/Corporations-SuccessManagement/Customers/ALLIANZ/2.%20EXTERNAL/3.%20Projects/Wave%20AZ%20KBV%20DE%20Expense%20(Ongoing)/02.%20Workshops/ERS_Allianz%20KBV_DE.xlsx?d=w214565d8b2bc4fecae15bb40bd8ae794&csf=1&web=1&e=mZOuCR]

 

*TEMPLATE DIVERGENCES*

The only divergence from ABV configuration, will be at FDF level.

We need to hide several User FDFs not used in KBV.

Go to ERS "Free Data Field" tab, and filter by "Used KBV" Column with NO value.

Hide in VEGAS UI all FDFs not used by KBV. They´ll be used in the background for fake calculations, as we keep the same ABV custom logic.

These hidden FDFs will be fed by Conovum with fake values.

 

*STATEMENT CALCULATION STARTING DATE*

KBVs won´t start billing in Amadeus cytric until the start of the new year (01.01.2023).

column1: Heidelberg FR :  UAT changes
column26:
!image-2022-10-11-12-06-48-605.png|thumbnail! 
If you forgot to describe your receipt, you will get a notification to add a description. If you have choosen an entertainment receipt type, it is not possible to save your receipt after you added a description.

column1: Allianz - Verb bad named in system text
column26:
Dear Team,

The verb "Geben" is properly named in General Allianz system texts but it seems that in some locations it's wording wrongly "Beben" instead "Geben".

As you can see I verify some locations and I found all this with the bad named for "Geben".

Please could you fixed?

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: Add new error code translation
column26:
In EXPENG-850 we will align the error code which is send back to vegas with the error code which is used to look-up the error translation.

Therefore affected systems need to be enhanced with the "new" error code to return the same translations after the next engine release.

Add a new translation in the translations block for the following systems (EMS) using the code "error.expense.element.attachment.invalidCount" and the translations from the already existing code "validation.element.attachment.invalidCount":

 
||server||system id||system name||status||
|staging|6028051739|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|staging-b| |emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|staging|4027622497|AMA-Allianz-Test|(/)|
|mega|7079363564|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|travel|5243140557|volkswagen-SKODA-AUTO-DE|(/)|
|travel|7479786711|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|travel|3730432632|volkswagen-bentley|(/)|
|world|8697206181|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|amadeus|6183609340|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|amadeus|1118096112|ama-de-allianz|(/)|
|amadeus2|304899801|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|americas|685461895|emsreferencesystem|(/)|
|apac|1022992359|emsreferencesystem|(/)|

 

I can only provide the system ids. I assume you have access to a hierarchy export due to using the config converter for these systems. If not you will have to request a hierarchy export from ITS.

column1: Vaillant AT : UAT fixes
column26:
*Expense statement ID :  11526342*

VAT Rates mismatch :

Receipt #7: Business entertainment external: We did pick a 5% VAT, coded V7, but in the posting summary, V10 is mentioned.
Receipt #8: Business entertainment for seminars external: We did pick a 13%VAT (coded V6), but the calculation is based on 11,5%.
Receipt #9: Business entertainment for seminars external: We did pick a 5% VAT, coded V7, but in the posting summary, V10 is mentioned.
Receipt #21: Supporting materials: The GL-Account needs to change to 60261000.
Receipt #29: Business entertainment external: We did pick a 5% VAT, coded V7, but in the posting summary, V10 is mentioned.


*Expense statement ID :  11526342*

Receipt #2: Conferences/ Seminars – we need to add wording to the name, have reflected that in the ERS-update attached. (Adding “internally”)
Receipt #5: Communication/ Adveritsement – we need to add a custom logic, that this expense type can only be used with a selected internal order number.

Entertainment section: Please have a look at the entertainment calculation. The totals for the VAT do not add-up:

 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

Receipt #20: Car maintenance – there the VAT calculation needs correction – this is meant to be 20% but not deductible – with a tax calculation of 0%.
Receipt #40: Entertainment external – for all entertainments, the tip needs to be posted separately with the VAT-rate of VN. The GL-account is the same as the corresponding entertainment. Also, the VAT-calculation for the entertainment part does not add up – it is a 20% VAT, coded V2 – the calculation and posting shows 0,- EUR VAT.



*Label correction* : Change all the VAT label of “V10” to “V1”. This is only relating to the labels in the UI and in the export, but not the calculation. The 10% still remains.
column222:
18/Oct/22 2:44 PM;gmalarski;Hi [~achattopadhyay] ,

Please clarify with the client the below topics:
 * Receipt #8: Business entertainment for seminars external: We did pick a 13%VAT (coded V6), but the calculation is based on 11,5%.
*the calculations is actually correct, because tax deduction is taken form Net value*

 * Receipt #2: Conferences/ Seminars – we need to add wording to the name, have reflected that in the ERS-update attached. (Adding “internally”)
*Receipt 2 is "Business entertainment external (Seminars)" should replace "external" wording with "internal" or you are talking about another receipt?*

column1: Wacker AG / Conditional Workflow does not work correctly for the role Approver
column26:
We have this CW configured for the role Appover:
_In addition to the rail tickets (paid by company), per diems may be included in the statement so that the statement does not have to be approved! But no other receipts!_

Issue:
I created statement 270376 on Staging and in this statement we only have kilometers driven and no receipt and no per diems.
So the workflow for this statement must be:
1. Approval
2. Auditing

But this statement skips the step Approver and goes directly to the Auditor:

So please check this incorrect behavior and please adjust it! We have the same behavior on Bali Server, tested with statement 354170!

So could you please check if it is possible to map this kind of receipt automatically on the new receipt type "Selbstafahrerreise"?

column1: Heidelberg FR :  UAT changes - Workflow
column26: Please change the WF for all the FR locations to : *Enhanced Approval without Auditing*
column222:
13/Oct/22 9:41 AM;djagodzki;Hello [~achattopadhyay] ,
Changes are ready to be tested on BALI.
It is important for the new workflow *Enhanced Approval without Auditing* to have proper fields defined as access rights for users. Without it, workflow will throw an error and submitting any statement will be blocked as system will not be able to find restricted Approvers.

However there is big problem with setting up those rights. As long as enhanced workflow isn't set in those general settings, you won't be able to set proper access rights for user. The option *(Expense Approver (restricted))* will be greyed out.

!image-2022-10-13-09-36-24-595.png!
!image-2022-10-13-09-37-56-368.png!

If we switch workflow in general settings to *enhanced app. without audit* and then modify *Expense Approver (restricted)* access right for user it will work. We can then go back to previous workflow and even though the option will be greyed out again and not selected, the system will remember the setting and it will still work.
This needs to be re-done for any new user who would like to do first-level approval.

In case of any questions feel free to contact me :D;;;

column1: dmD: Check set-up of special overnight case part II
column26:
Please check the set-up of "Special overnight case" for customer dm-drogerie. 

Please take system [https://bali.sofia.ifao.net/ibe/?system=lcc-demo] for reference or please consult with Doreen Ebert on how to set-up this functionality. 

Customer dm-drogerie is reporting that the case does not reflect German law due to the current set-up. 

E.g. if both absence lines are marked as "Special overnight case" no per-diem is calculated even though the business trip is >8h in total. It does work if "Special overnight case" is ticked in absence line of day 1 only.  

In the reference system the calculation is correct, even though both absences are marked as "Special overnight case". 

The reference system is less error-prone. In addition, from a user perspective, the handling is way easier in the reference system.

column1: Continental -  Update customelogic and system text
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please update the customelogic.

1)  Allow for multiple Similar Receipts
In the case of an Air Ticket, calculation is permitted if there is a receipt of the same amount on the same day.


{code:java}
          <typeName code="expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.flight">
            <name locale="en_US">Air ticket</name>
            <name locale="fr_FR">Voy/Depl Avion</name>
          </typeName>
{code}

2) Remove Caps rate for receipt of "Office supplies (Home Office)"
Currently, it is set to generate a verification error if it exceeds 250 EUR.
Customer would like to remove the current rules about the validation date and the amount and change the information message which is currently displayed.

System text
{code:java}
          <item value="expenseStatement.receipts.general.expense.basereceipt.receipt.continental.office.supplies.home.office">
            <name locale="fr_FR">Le montant maximum à saisir et à rembourser est de 50% de la facture avec un plafond défini (cf mail RH). Cumul des factures sur une seule NDF.</name>
            <name locale="en_US">The max entered amount to claim is 50% of the invoice within max defined by HR dept. All tickets must be in one sole Travel Expense document.</name>
          </item>
        </values>
{code}

Best regards,
Yutaka

column1: Hugo boss – Update PDF text
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please update the PDF text.

https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/ama-de-hugoboss/de/default/20211102-99990101/report/subbusinessentertainmentsdetail.jrxml

<Now>
 *!image-2022-10-03-09-40-07-040.png|width=774,height=168!*<After>

English:

HUGO BOSS is required by tax law to conduct regular internal audits. Due to this obligation, you must carefully store your original receipts for up to three months after reimbursement of the travel expense statement. Travel Management must be able to request original receipts from all incoming travel expense statements on a random basis in order to check the receipts for authenticity and thus comply with tax digitization requirements.

Sending the original receipts to Travel Management is therefore only necessary upon explicit request.

 German:

 HUGO BOSS ist steuerrechtlich verpflichtet regelmäßige interne Auditprüfungen durchzuführen. Aufgrund dieser Verpflichtung musst Du Deine Originalbelege bis drei Monate nach Erstattung Deiner Reisekostenabrechnung sorgfältig aufbewahren. Das Travel Management muss stichprobenartig Originalbelege aus allen eingehenden Reisekostenabrechnungen anfordern können, um die Belege auf Echtheit zu überprüfen und um somit die steuerlichen Digitalisierungsvorgaben einzuhalten.

Ein Versand der Originalbelege an das Travel Management ist daher nur nach expliziter Bitte notwendig.

Best regards,
 Yutaka

column1: KPMG: "Abwesenheitsprämie" (additional per-diem based on specific parameters)
column26:
Dear colleagues from CL-Board,

a)

KPMG pays an additional per-diem, so-called "absence premium" of EUR 4.50 in addition to the statutory per-diems. This per-diem applies for full absence days and for arrival and departure days of more than 12 hours. 

The per-diem is not taxed by the employee, but as a per-diem by the employer.

To fulfill this requirement, we would need to use custom calculator. 

__________________________

This requirement has priority "A" for them and as most of you are aware, we are already in a very tense situation with KPMG.  

Negative impact for KPMG. They would not be able to pay their employees the additional per-diem which they do currently.

Possibility to even worsen the situation with KPMG.

___________________________

b) 

In addition, as they are very tax driven... they envision smth. like the below for their PDF Expense Report. We started the investigation around this requirement from Delivery site already. 

!image-2022-09-30-09-16-07-509.png|width=1001,height=541!
column222:
04/Oct/22 3:09 PM;gheorghe;Hi [~ccasper],

Is my understanding correct that this extra 4,50 per diem paid also after 3m in the context of the 3m rule?

Thanks for clarification

 ;;;
column223:
04/Oct/22 5:01 PM;ccasper;Hi [~gheorghe],

The description of the requirement from KPMG's document does not state anything about continuing the additional payment during the 3M-rule, but I would assume that the extra 4,50 is paid also within the 3M-rule. I'll follow-up with the customer and will try to get an answer by tomorrow, but please start the analysis on our site in any case.

Thanks and kind regards

Christian  ;;;
column224:
04/Oct/22 5:22 PM;gheorghe;additional info:

[5:19 PM] Christian CASPER

No, they want to see the split between what has been paid as per-diems within the 3M-rule and what has been paid as per-diem as part of the extra 4,50

They don't want to see both in one sum

But the PDF is not the focus, for us it is important that we get the green light for using custom calculators to reflect the payment logic for the 4,50 EUR in general

We can investigate what is possible in regards to the PDF at a later stage;;;
column225:
05/Oct/22 4:36 PM;gheorghe;Hi [~ccasper],

This has been discussed in the board

Adding 4.5 EUR/day it is possible with company rules

Adding 4.5 EUR per arrival/departure day is possible also w company rule (PerDiemDepartureArrivalTimeModifier) defining the hour of departure/arrival not the number of hours but according to Marius this is how it is in case of statutory as well

Perhaps you can test this one in EMS before and show it to the customer when talking to them

The added allowance will be shown as a total per day meaning in the PDF will show statutory +premium 4.5 and not show it split as KPMG is requesting it

The premium could be sent to them via wage types in the export for reporting/tax purposes as we assumed this was their need why they wanted split

In EMS the PDF is no longer customizable so please try them to convince them to drop the PDF need part 

Please clarify what should happen in the case of the 3m rule if after 3m they keep paying per diem + premium and how would they need the wages in this scenario, if possible by next board meeting as we did not discuss this part

Let me know if not clear

Thanks

 ;;;
column226:
26/Oct/22 10:21 AM;gheorghe;[~ccasper]  please re-add the label shall u need further analysis from the board

as I will take out from the list as nothing is expected from our side for now

Thanks

Andreea;;;

column1: Regular script timeouts
column26:
A custom perdiem script in calculation.AbsenceList is regularly timing out.

Example log: [kibana|https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/app/kibana#/doc/3afe1f90-e0e8-11ec-b748-a7b709a9fb27/ee.1-2022.39/doc?id=dp2gf4MBtNwRl3q3YhEP&_g=()]

The script itself is run after another perdiem calculation as well as the tax calculation (see [bitbucket|https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/ama-es-amadeus/fr/default/20170101-99990101/customlogic.properties.xml#308]) which will result in incorrect tax amounts. The first perdiem calculation is using company rules so maybe check if the scipt can be replaced by adding modifier to the company rules calculation.

The same script seems to be present in other countries of this system, therefore those should be adapted as well.

column1: Do not send warnings FDFs to the engine
column26:
All statement level FDFs are currently considered to be relevant attributes to load the EMS configuration.
 As security measure the EMS only accepts attribute lengths of 250 characters (key+value+1).

This causes an error during loading of the configuration whenever the warnings FDF is filled with much content.
 log correlationId: 1B15950D54724439A77861BAF8F31F09

The warnings FDF seem to be relevant only as a response from engine to vegas therefore it should not be send back to the engine. Do not use the "expense." prefix for this FDF so that the engine will ignore it on request. You might need to add the warnings link role to the return link whitelist.
column222:
28/Sep/22 11:08 AM;mstaszek;Hello :)

This means we need to refactor all systems both on vegas and engine side.
Because for sure it is not only in Continental which has this implementation.
 I think this should be done as some mini project [~raphose] [~gmalarski]

What do you think?;;;
column223:
28/Sep/22 11:30 AM;gmalarski;Hi,

Indeed it is a more time-consuming task, so we can consider it during the next planning;;;
column224:
28/Sep/22 11:58 AM;raphose;Hi,

Can we ask for the list of customers that override the 250 char, and appear in the logs to first focus on correcting those ones.

This list will help us to assess this initial effort and assess the need of a mini project.

Let's also share the change of practice to everyone so we will advice this to occur in the future.

Regarding to the cleaning of the existing customers, that does not appear in the logs, let's indeed plan this as a mini project.

Rgs;;;
column225:
28/Sep/22 12:17 PM;hilbich;Just to highlight.
Affected customers will not be able to calculate once the warnings FDF is filled with more then 250 characters and there is no meaningful error for the user to fix this issue.

Besides  that I don't see how this is much effort.
 * replace FDF linkrole in vegas config
 * replace all occurrences of that linkrole in custom logic scripts
 * add the linkrole to the return link whitelist

[~salajan] As far as I know this change has already been applied in other customer systems right?;;;
column226:
28/Sep/22 12:33 PM;salajan;indeed, it's a "huge find & replace".

my question is how do we handle existing statements? what happens to the warnings on them? does it mean years old statements which already have 250+ characters will become impossible to calculate?;;;
column227:
28/Sep/22 1:24 PM;mstaszek;[~salajan] this is the case in this situation. 
 There was a ticket for Continental to change link role https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CI-7082 , but unfortunately script was only adjusted to handle new link. So any already existing statement couldn't work and there is a blocking error now in this case.

I also had similar ticket for endress hauser https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CI-7038 and I implemented script that handles both old and new link. We should do this that way to avoid further issues.

[~hilbich] maybe this is not huge effort, but there is some action to be done because we need to:
 * identify all systems with expense.warnings
 * create new configs files (vegas) with new validity dates and new link roles for every system
 * refactor scripts (ce-engine) to handle warnings and limit warning messages (I put limits expense.warnings = 200 and warnings = 1500)
 * and finally check if there are any systems that was already changed like Continental that could cause issues (link was just replaced and there is no logic that can handle old statements)

So I think what we can do is:
 * quickly fix Continental issue
 * plan for next iteration to refactor rest of the systems;;;

column1: Edit engine.pdf.template in the advanced system settings block for all customer EMS systems
column26:
Hello codebusters,

Please update the advanced system settings in each customer system on the EMS by setting the property engine.pdf.template to false.

This makes sure that any newly implemented system will use the report template as default while any old migrated customer system still uses the BlockReport / BlockAdvancedReport blocks.

column228:
04/Oct/22 7:37 PM;skarja;Hello [~gmalarski],

I got feedback from the customer.

The values for the per diems are fine, BUT..........:

*{color:#ff0000}there is still an issue with the "Income Tax relevant" and the "Included VAT".{color}*

*{color:#ff0000}The calculation must be the following:{color}*
 * sum for absence more than 12 hours: full amount = 41,40 Euro 
 * sum for absence from more than 3 - 12 hours: 1/12 per hour = 3,45 per hour
 examples:
 -> system calculates 5 hrs absence = 5x 3,45 Euro = 17,25 Euro
 -> system calculates 6 hrs absence = 6x 3,45 Euro = 20,70 Euro
 * tax must be calculated from the amount of 26,40 Euro per day or according to the calculated absence with 9,09%:
 sum=41,40 Euro, tax calculation 9,09% of 26,40 Euro = 2,39976 Euro (rounded to two decimals)
 * income tax relevant = 15 Euro per day or according to the calculated absence

*{color:#ff0000}calculation examples:{color}*

1. your test from teams chat:

per diem 24 hrs 41,40 Euro -> ok
 *{color:#ff0000}tax must be 2,40 Euro (9,09% of 26,40 Euro){color}*
 income tax relevant: 15 Euro -> ok 

!image-2022-10-04-14-09-57-336.png|width=849,height=632!

 

2. my test: 

per diem 6 hrs 20,70 Euro -> ok (calculation 6/12 of 26,40 Euro + 6/12 of 15,00 Euro)
 per diem 24 hrs 41,40 Euro -> ok (calculation 12/12 of 26,40 Euro + 12/12 of 15,00 Euro)
 => sum:  62,10 Euro = ok

*{color:#ff0000}tax:{color}*
 *{color:#ff0000}tax must be 3,59964 Euro, rounded 3,60 Euro (9,09% of 39,60 Euro){color}*

income tax relevant:
 for 6 hrs: 7,50 Euro (calculation 6/12 of 15,00 Euro)
 for 24 hrs: 15,00 Euro (calculation 12/12 of 15,00 Euro)
 *{color:#ff0000}=> sum income tax relevant: 18/12 = 22,50 Euro{color}*

!image-2022-10-04-14-12-32-898.png|width=883,height=921!

 

3. customers example: 

per diem 2x 24 hrs 82,80 Euro -> ok 

tax:
 {color:#ff0000}*tax must be 4,79952 Euro, rounded 4,80 Euro (9,09% of 39,60 Euro)*{color}

income tax relevant:
 for 2x more than 12 hrs:  2x 15,00 Euro 
 {color:#ff0000}*=> sum income tax relevant: 30,00 Euro*{color}

!image-2022-10-04-14-16-37-644.png!;;;
column229:
17/Oct/22 11:01 PM;skarja;Hello [~gmalarski],

please see Doreen's feedback from https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1187

Unfortunately I have to ask you to contact [~dykiert] who made the system setup.

Best regards,

Annette



+*Issue as reported:*+
1. The VAT is incorrect
2. The Per Diem and Income Tax is incorrect

+*Root Cause:*+
To clarify - Porsche is NOT using Collective Agreements in Expense. They are using ONE company specific calculation which applies to all users. The only difference was the maximum amounts the Travelers could receive per day.

The system is behaving correctly

1. VAT: The VAT is calculated from the Per Diem Amount. From product side there is no limititaton to calculate the VAT only from 26,40 EUR. I raised this multiple times during the project and Porsche was OK with the way we calculate. Please align with Christian.

2. Per Diem. The setup on the system is not correct. I can already see from the amounts that the given Statement does not apply a day-based calculation. Checking in EMS there is nearly no Entity using the Porsche rules. Moreover, those that do use it, don't have the daily calculation. Thus, the Income Tax cannot be calculated properly. Please align with Christian and Dominik, I explained them how the setup should look like



!image-2022-10-17-22-59-21-289.png|width=1190,height=643!

 

+*Solution:*+
The system is behaving as designed and configured

+*Follow up:*+
1. Follow up with Product Management to get the product changed
2. Have Delivery update the configuration

 

 ;;;

column1: Add statutory exchange rate providers
column26:
Systems whichs home country do not contain an exchange rate provider will result in incorrect calculations or exchange rate exceptions in case the home currency is changed.

To prevent this all countries should have at least one exchange rate provider configured. Add the following providers (including fallbacks) to the statutory file-based configurations:
 # FR - DGFIP;ECB;OANDA
 # PL - NBP;ECB;OANDA
 # foreign - ECB;OANDA

All other countries global provider should be removed so that the foreign fallback is used.

*Afterwards, update all global EMS systems by importing the applied changes.*

 +Future version+

*French version :* 
 Si le montant du plafond est dépassé, veuillez compléter le document intitulé ‘justificatif de dépassement / dérogation’ et le joindre dans l’entête de la NDF afin de faire approuver ce dépassement par votre SHD et le service Finances. Vous trouverez le document correspondant ici, LIEN : ([https://continental.sharepoint.com/teams/cs_10001560/Shared%20Documents/Forms/par_regle.aspx?RootFolder=%2Fteams%2Fcs%5F10001560%2FShared%20Documents%2FCA%5F0200118&FolderCTID=0x0120009C42F67A5D934740A61C8EC9AB012B2D])
 En cas de pertes de justificatifs de paiements, veuillez compléter le document ‘Justificatif de substitution’ qui se trouve sur le lien ci-dessous.
 Ce document devra être signé par le voyageur, son SHD et le département finances. Il sera ensuite joint à la NDF ainsi que les preuves de paiement associées. Ex : relevés bancaires correspondants LIEN([https://continental.sharepoint.com/teams/cs_11002316/ANNEXE%20PROCEDURE%20VOYAGES/Forms/AllItems.aspx?viewid=e136fe4a%2Deb66%2D4703%2D8c0b%2D74703e2ad0d7&id=%2Fteams%2Fcs%5F11002316%2FANNEXE%20PROCEDURE%20VOYAGES%2FPROCEDURES%20ASSOCIEES%20AUX%20VOYAGES%202020)]

*+English version+*:
If the limit cap is exceeded, please fill in the document called ‘justificatif de dépassement / dérogation’ and add it at the top of your expense statement for approval by your disciplinary lead and the finance department. You will find the relating doc here. LINK ([https://continental.sharepoint.com/teams/cs_10001560/Shared%20Documents/Forms/par_regle.aspx?RootFolder=%2Fteams%2Fcs%5F10001560%2FShared%20Documents%2FCA%5F0200118&FolderCTID=0x0120009C42F67A5D934740A61C8EC9AB012B2D])

 When the proof of the expense is list, please fill the ‘Substitution document which is in the link below. The document has to be signed by the traveler, his disciplinary lead, and the Finance department.

This document must be attached with the travel expenses document and all proofs of payment. For instance, relating bank statements LINK ([https://continental.sharepoint.com/teams/cs_10001560/Shared%20Documents/Forms/par_regle.aspx?RootFolder=%2Fteams%2Fcs%5F10001560%2FShared%20Documents%2FCA%5F0200118&FolderCTID=0x0120009C42F67A5D934740A61C8EC9AB012B2D])

 

 

Best regards,
 Yutaka

column1: Vaillant AT : Postal code
column26:
Postal Code validation for travelling of employees at destination of occupation.

" We decided, that we do not need a logic to validate the postal codes of destination against the one, stored in the traveller profile This is to reduce the number of absence lines, e.g. when travelling to multiple stops in a day. 

The FDF Postal Code will remain in the GUI though, but the entry will only be a text based entry. The values of this FDF need to be imprinted on the PDF for auditing purpose.


Please remove the validation, and add/print the values of the FDF Postal code in the PDF. 

P.S. : Please add as much space as possible as there will be more than 1 Postal code in several cases.
